description: T-fal 4.2L Digital Air Fryer with Touch Screen, Non-Stick, 8 Automatic Programs for Chicken, Pizza Meat, Dishwasher Safe Black EY4018MX - The T-fal Digital Air Fryer has 8 pre-loaded automatic programs for preparing different types of food: fries, chicken, fish, pancake, meat, shrimp, grill, pizza. It has an XL capacity of 4.2 L, timer of 60 minutes, up to 200 °C of temperature and power of 1400 W and 127 V. Features Non-stick technology in the basket. Its design allows for easy cleaning in the dishwasher.
